alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mission Bay, or near Deerfield Beach. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boca Raton, Delray Beach, Mission Bay, Boca Pointe, Boca Del Mar, Hamptons At Boca Raton, Whisper Walk, Kings Point, Loxahatchee NWR, Fau South Campus, Boca West, South County Regional Park, Sandalfoot Cove, Morikami Park and Boca Raton Equestrian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
